name: Brozzme Hover integration
author: Beno√Æt Faure

sections.description: Add css3 effect animations in your website without coding skills. Just add class or id you want to animate in the settings panel and enjoy the great animation Hover.css by Ian Lunn.
sections.installation:
1. Upload \”brozzme-hover\” to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
  3. Search for the id and class name you want to animate.
  4. Go to the settings panel, put the id and class, choose effect transition.
  5. Enjoy
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload \”brozzme-hover\” to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
  3. Search for the id and class name you want to animate.
  4. Go to the settings panel, put the id and class, choose effect transition.
  5. Enjoy

short_description: Add css3 effect animations by Ian Lunn in your website without coding skills.
